imdb.plot outline: A document-interview shot at the Monumental Cemetery in Milan, with the songwriter, producer and painter Ivan Cattaneo. Life, anecdotes, songs, meetings, all you need to know about one of the most seminal artists of italian music scene. Forty year career and a great influence on famous colleagues. Not only that, he is historical importance in the Italian gay movement, was the first Italian artist to come out and have to suffer the impacts of the environment, especially in the seventies, was narrow-minded and petty.
imdb.title: Ivan Cattaneo: A Cuore Nudo
